price: Wala sikutakini ujira juu yake. Ujira wangu hauko ila kwa Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote.
arabic: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Wala sitaki kwenu ujira wowote kwa hii nasaha yangu na uwongozi wangu. Ujira wangu uko kwa Mwenye kumiliki walimwengu wote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin in ajriya illā ʿalā rabbi al-ʿālamīna
